1.title: Angelina's Fancy Tutu/Angelina and the Musical Theater

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

1.plot: Angelina finds a fancy tutu, and she and Polly search for the owner; When the Mousical the Musical performance is cancelled at Camembert, Viki and her friends decided to perform their own show.

2.title: Angelina and the Hearts on Ice/Angelina's Kitchen Band

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

2.plot: Ms Mimi takes the mouselings on a field trip to show them that musical instruments can be found anywhere. Gracie doesn't see the point in finding other ways to make music when they have such great instruments at school. With the help of her friends and Mrs. Thimble, she discovers that learning can be fun and inspiration can be found even in the most unlikely of places!

3.title: Angelina and the Carnival/Angelina Jumps the River

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

3.plot: Ms Mimi gives the class assignment of finding a prop to help them increase their fitness levels. Angelina mistakenly thinks the project is easy and procrastinates. By the end of the day, she has nothing to show her class. When she learns to swallow her pride and ask her little sister for help, she comes up with the perfect prop!

4.title: Angelina and the Windy Children's Day/Angelina and Ms. Mimi's Dance

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

4.plot: The Mouselings' Annual Children's Day does not go to plan; Ms. Mimi performs a special modern dance, and explains to the mouselings that it took a lot of support and practice.

5.title: Angelina and the Mini-Mouseling/Angelina's Helpful Friend

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

5.plot: Polly wants to become taller, so Angelina and her friends show her that she should be happy about her size; Viki tries to help everybody at once.

6.title: Angelina's Mother's Day/Angelina and the Father's Day Surprise

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

6.plot: Angelina is inspired by musical dynamics that Ms. Mimi had taught in class to make her chores fun as a Mother's Day Gift; While decorating the store for Father's Day, Angelina and Polly learn about klezmer music.

7.title: Angelina and Polly's Big Day/Angelina and the Smelly Cheese

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

7.plot: When Alice is babysitting Polly, Angelina becomes worried Polly prefers Alice over her; The mouselings are worried that Mrs. Thimble's special Fête Française cheese, which has an overwhelming smell, will scare everyone away.

8.title: Angelina's Indian Lunchtime/Angelina, AZ, and Cheezy Z

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

8.plot: AJ's birthday is coming up and he is so persistent with dropping hints about it that he almost disrupts his friends' surprise arrangements for him.

9.title: Angelina's Trick-or-Treat Feat/Angelina and the Laughing Poet

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

9.plot: The mouselings' Halloween costumes don't arrive in time for Trick or Treat. What will Angelina and her friends do? When they decide creative ways to express their characters through dance, they realize they didn't need costumes after all!

10.title: Angelina and the Dragon Dance/Angelina's Opera

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

10.plot: It's time for Chipping Cheddar's annual Cheese Day celebration and Angelina's class gets to present the cheese-related history to the whole town.

19.title: Angelina's Nature Dance/Angelina's Spring Fling

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

19.plot: Angelina and her classmates create a nature-inspired dance routine.

1.title: Angelina's New Home/Angelina's New School

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

1.plot: Angelina is not thrilled about her move to the other side of Chipping Cheddar, and even plans to quit her new school; It is Angelina's first day of school and it does not go as well as she planned it would.

2.title: Angelina's New Ballet Teacher/Angelina's Dance Partner

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

2.plot: Angelina worries she will not learn much from her new ballet teacher Ms. Mimi since she teaches differently from her old teacher; Alice gets the sniffles and cannot dance with Angelina on Dance-With-A-Partner-Day, so she decides to let Viki dance with her.

3.title: Angelina's Gift for Ms. Mimi/Angelina's Oldest Friend

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

3.plot: Angelina, Gracie, Marco and Viki want to give Ms. Mimi the best birthday ever, but things do not go to plan; Angelina introduces Alice to her new Camembert Academy friends.

4.title: Angelina and the Hip Hop Kid/Angelina and the Broken Fiddle

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

4.plot: Angelina meets A.Z., a new student at Camembert Academy; Angelina and Polly accidentally break Mr. Mouseling's fiddle.

5.title: Angelina and Alice's Big Night/Angelina and the Giant

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

5.plot: Angelina wants her old friend Alice to attend her recital as her special guest, but Alice has an ice-skating event that night. Later, they learn that Alice will also be attending Camembert Academy; Angelina and Alice create a prop for Jackie and the Beanstalk.

6.title: Angelina's Musical Day/Angelina's Crazy Solo

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

6.plot: Ms. Mimi develops laryngitis while directing rehearsals for a class production of Peter and the Wolf, so she communicates with the students by using music; Angelina tries to have her way when she and her friends put on a show.

7.title: Angelina and the Irish Jig/Angelina En Pointe

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

7.plot: Viki returns from Tippermousy with a disk of Irish music, which Angelina accidentally breaks while learning how to do an Irish jig. Angelina tries to audition for the Mouskinov Ballet.

8.title: Angelina and the Rock Band/Angelina's Lost Ice Skates

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

8.plot: Angelina and Alice are having a fun day together. It is such fun that they become somewhat absent minded and Angelina turns up for a show without her skates.

9.title: Angelina and the New Music Store/Angelina & Ms. Mimi

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

9.plot: Angelina celebrates the grand opening of her dad's new music shop; Ms. Mimi admonishes Angelina for talking in class.

10.title: Angelina and Super Polly/Angelina's Dance Like a Cake

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

10.plot: After reading a book about a mouseling with superhero powers, Polly thinks she might have special abilities too; Viki puts together Dance-Like-a-Cake Day, in which dancers must bring a cake associated with a dance, but Angelina's plans may fall flat after her gingerbread house collapses.

11.title: Angelina's Sleepover/Angelina's Noisy, Messy Lunchtime

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

11.plot: Angelina, Viki, and Gracie have a sleepover the night before the Silly Hat Carnival, but stay up too late and then oversleep, causing them to miss an important ballet rehearsal; Ms. Mimi cancels lunchtime rehearsals when Angelina and her friends are too loud, noisy, and messy, leading Angelina to host the rehearsals in her attic dance studio.

12.title: Angelina's Holiday Treats/Angelina and the Front Row Ticket

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

12.plot: Angelina and Marco overindulge in candy canes and gingerbread cookies prior to a performance of Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy; Angelina is excited about seeing The Nutcracker and invites two of her friends to go with her but then realizes she only has one extra ticket, so now she has to decide between Alice and Viki.

13.title: Angelina Keeps the Peace/Angelina and Alice Mousikova

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

13.plot: Angelina, Viki, Gracie and A.Z. work together to develop a dance for class, but Gracie and AZ disagree over what the dance should be, so Angelina must find a way get everyone to agree with each other; Alice adopts the persona of her idol, Russian gymnast Anna Mousikova, after Miss Mimi assigns reports on the mouselings' heroes. Alice became so obsessed with her idol, she distances herself from her friends.

14.title: Angelina and Gracie's Creative Day/Angelina's Big Part

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

14.plot: Gracie contemplates copying an established dance for Make-It-All-Up-Day when she cannot come up with one on her own, but Angelina persuades her to improvise a new routine; Angelina has second thoughts about playing the main part in a school play Once Upon a Pillow when she learns her character is asleep for most of the performance.

15.title: Angelina and the Tummy Butterflies/Angelina and the Magician

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

15.plot: The mouselings learn about jazz dance, improvisation, and poetry, but when they have to present poems to the entire class Alice develops a serious case of tummy butterflies and Angelina must help Alice with memorizing her poem; Gracie, who has been tap dancing for years, forgets practicing in favor of learning magic.

16.title: Angelina Cheerleader/Angelina's Ballet School

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

16.plot: Angelina tries to support Marco in the Mouse Marathon, which includes forming a cheerleading team to cheer him on, but all the attention unnerves him; Angelina opens her own ballet school in the attic to teach Polly ballet, but her overbearing manner soon causes her sister to quit.

17.title: Angelina and Roquefort's Rhythmic Ghost/Angelina's Lunch Table

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

17.plot: Gracie, Angelina, Viki, and A.Z. think they heard a mysterious tapping noise in Roquefort Hall is from a ghost; Angelina's friendship with Gracie is strained due to the many friends that Angelina has and the limited time she has to spend with each of them.

18.title: Angelina and the Big News/Angelina's Secret Valentine

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

18.plot: When Angelina, Viki, and Marco mistakenly think Ms. Mimi is getting married after overhearing her talking on the phone, they learn about wedding marches and organ music in order to make her wedding day special; Angelina receives a Valentine card from a secret admirer.

19.title: Angelina and the Front Page/Angelina's Cheese Roll

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

19.plot: Angelina helps her dad take pictures of Camembert Academy and its students for a Mouseland Herald story, but the assignment turns difficult because Gracie wants to be in every shot; Angelina helps A.Z. learn the complicated Cheese Roll dance.

20.title: Angelina and the Musical Plant/Angelina's Hip Hop Boys Show

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

20.plot: When the mouselings cannot agree on the music for a show, Angelina forges a compromise by applying a lesson from a science project; Angelina is set to direct a hip-hop dance show, but it may not go on when A.Z. hurts his foot.

21.title: Angelina and the Cheddar Cheese Slide/Angelina and the Case of the Missing Music

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

21.plot: After reading a detective story, Viki is determined to become a good detective herself. When Marco's sheet music disappears, it's the perfect opportunity for her to practice her detective skills and try to find the missing music!

22.title: Angelina, the Pet Sitter/Angelina and the Music Box

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

22.plot: Polly gets a music box in the mail from her grandmother and she falls in love with the waltz music it plays. When Angelina accidentally breaks the special box, she replaces it, but the new music box plays a different type of music. In the end, Polly realizes she can still dance her favourite waltz to the music from her new music box.

23.title: Angelina and the Dance-athon/Angelina and the Art Show

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

23.plot: Angelina and her friends organize a marathon for the Chipping Cheddar Earth Club as part of their "Camembert Cares" school project. After Gracie accidentally recycles the pledge sheet, Angelina uses her ingenuity to save the day!

24.title: Angelina's Hiccups/Angelina and the Must-Have Bag

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

24.plot: When all her friends have an "Eva the Diva" bag, Angelina desperately wants one too. After working hard to earn enough money for one, she discovers that being original and creative is much more exciting than following the crowd.

25.title: Angelina's Room/Angelina's Camembert Parade

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

25.plot: When Angelina tries to organize her friends in a parade, everything goes wrong! Nobody is working together and the parade is chaotic! Through her resourcefulness, Angelina finds a way to gain control to keep everyone on track.

26.title: Angelina and the Bandleader/Angelina and Polly's Two-Hour Show

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

26.plot: A.Z. breaks one of his drumsticks, making rehearsal for Angelina's musical impossible, until he discovers another way to keep the beat; Angelina and Polly put on a show for their parents, but the Mouseling's are too tired.

27.title: Angelina and the Marcel Mouseau Mime Challenge/Angelina and the Disco Dance Craze

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

27.plot: Gracie discovers the joys of Disco Dancing and just can't stop! She even puts dancing over her responsibilities to help her friends. In the end, Gracie learns that she can still dance, have fun, AND help others.

28.title: Angelina and the Mouselinghood of the Dancing Shoes/Angelina and Her Parents' Dance Lesson

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

28.plot: When Angelina, Gracie, Viki and Alice create a girls' club, the boys want to join. At first the girls decide their club should be for girls only, but in the end, they realize the club will be much more fun when everyone is included.

29.title: Angelina and the New Jeans/Angelina and the Poster

episode of.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (TV Series 2008–2010)

29.plot: AJ is having trouble dancing in his new jeans, because they are just so uncomfortable! Angelina and Alice help out by creating a whole new way to dance.

imdb.plot outline: Join Angelina Ballerina and her friends for enchanting adventures filled with princesses, princes, kings and queens. Dancing their way through Chipping Cheddar, Angelina encounters an evil witch, uncovers a Cinderella-like mystery, treats the king and queen to a regal performance, and brings an epic tale to life with her friends!
imdb.title: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps
akas: Angelina Ballerina: The Next Steps (United Kingdom)

other companies.name: Menfond Electronic Art & Computer Design Company

plot: Join Angelina Ballerina as she finds her way in her new school, puts together her own show and tries to land a leading role in the Mouskinov Ballet. Prepare to pirouette along with everyone's favorite ballerina in these sparkling stories!::Anonymous

Join Angelina Ballerina and her friends for enchanting adventures filled with princesses, princes, kings and queens. Dancing their way through Chipping Cheddar, Angelina encounters an evil witch, uncovers a Cinderella-like mystery, treats the king and queen to a regal performance, and brings an epic tale to life with her friends!::Anonymous
